titleStmt.title: To my posterity, 1675. (Anno ætatis quadrigesimo secundo.) Not to ... to any bod[y] ... [pub]lickly. I know the booksellers shops abound with numerous volumes upon all subjects, therefore it's vanity in any body in this age to attempt by his writings to treat the world with novelty ...
titleStmt.author: Lytcott, George, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Title of the copy cataloged is obscured by the property stamp of the British Library.
Copy cataloged has MS. note at head of p. 1: George Lytcott, K.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
